features: 【3D Design】 The 3D shape of KN95 cup dust mask is designed according to the human face shape to ensure the tightness, to fit the human face, to increase the breathing volume when use the face mask. breathable face mask KN95 can greatly improve the permeability, and to make wearing and exhaling more comfortable.

【5-Ply Protective Layer】KN95 face masks are made of two layers of non-woven cloth, two layers of melt-blown fabric, one layer of hot air cotton. Inner skin-friendly layer absorb the moisture from the breath, 5-ply KN95 mask is designed to offer more protection than a standard disposable 3-Ply mask.

【Perfect packaging】This product contains 60 face masks, Each of our KN95 masks are sealed in individual package for better protection.which can avoid the pollution caused by touch when taking the mask. Can be perfectly placed in your backpack, purse and pocket.

【WIDELY USE】This kn95 protective masks are good for transport drivers,Commercial Buildings, Design & Construction, Food Processing, Food Safety, General Manufacturing, Heavy Infrastructure, Mining, Oil & Gas, Transportation, etc because they have daily contacts with large amount of people.

【Disclaimer】If you are not satisfied with our products, please feel free to contact us.We take full responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our best to solve your problems quickly and efficiently!This KN95 mask is NOT an N95 mask. For more information about KN95 masks please see the following before you purchase: amazon.com/AboutKN95s.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep the face mask clean before use. Do not touch the rear side of the face mask.Do not wash the face mask with water. Water will destroy the filtering ability and protective nature of the mask.Do not steam the face mask or put it in the microwave.Keep the face mask away from vapor, oils, chemicals, paints, liquid, acid, and alkaline objects.Make sure to discard the face mask when it becomes visibily ditry or breathing resistance increases remarkably.YOTU face mask is the ideal selection for your daily use, you can use it in school, office, public transportation, city streets, malls. Keep you far from dust, PM 2.5, haze, smoke, automobile exhaust, etc...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These make me feel very secure when I have to wear them in crowded situations. They fit my face perfectly with the bendable nosepiece and stretchy ear loops as well as being comfortable and lightweight. They come individually wrapped so I can throw some in my purse and know they will stay clean. They are breathable even in cold or windy conditions. The price is great for so many of them and I will buy more to always have these in my cupboard. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ear straps are not very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very good value for the money, sometimes the ear loops separate from the body of the mask, sometimes they are short which gives you an uncomfortable fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Number 1 for me
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect mask. It stays on with no dropping from my face. It dies no touch my lips, I feel protected while out and about. This is NY 3rd box. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Confort and safety
reviews.reviewText: Great masks, great product comfortable and effective!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great buy for the KN95. The ear loops extends to my ears with a comfortable fit and the mask fits great as well. All around comfortable fit. Plus, the price was right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Original Headline was "Sandalwood Mothballs!" -- I just bought more!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: JUNE 9, 2022If you read my original review below, you will see, like many other reviews, that I mentioned a smell. A lot of people call it a chemical smell.Since my original purchase in February, I have tried three more brands of KN95, and one brand of KN94. You know what? They -all- have a similar chemical smell. Read about the different layers that make up the mask. That is going to have a smell!So what's the solution? Open the package and remove the mask. Hang it off your wrist while you walk or drive to wherever you're going. Put the mask on. If you notice a smell at that point, you won't even think about it two minutes later.So today, I came back, changed my former 3-star rating to 5-star, and ordered two more boxes.These masks are large enough for an adult male, and the loops are long enough, they don't pull my ears out of shape. The mask itself is large enough to easily breathe and seals well against the sides of my face. I wear eyeglasses. The wire on the nose bridge is better than literally -all- the other brands I tried, creating enough of a seal that my glasses don't fog up!Another factor that I have learned to appreciate is the masks are individually wrapped. Put one in your pocket and it's as good as if it just came out of the box.Other reviews mention that quality has changed, or the masks are low quality. Again, I reordered today and already have the new masks this evening. They are the same as I received before. Don't listen to the hysteria! 😝

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Even though pandemic is over. It is still great to where these especially in the winter as you have individual who like to not where a mask when they are sick causing everyone else to get sick. These are comfortable and do not hurt the back of your ears and contour to your face easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: I, personally, only like cloth masks but cloth masks aren’t going to keep any sickness away. I got these because they’re the closest feeling to cloth while giving me the most protection.
